code: @Test public void findFromClassWhenSourceIsNullShouldThrowException() {     assertThatIllegalArgumentException().isThrownBy(() -> this.finder.findFromClass((Class<?>) null)).withMessageContaining("Source must not be null"). }

@Test public void findFromPackageWhenSourceIsNullShouldThrowException() {     assertThatIllegalArgumentException().isThrownBy(() -> this.finder.findFromPackage((String) null)).withMessageContaining("Source must not be null"). }
